the last time i played this was over five years ago but it deserves a review one the best games i ever played in my life it was one of those games that shaped the kinds of games i seek out story rich funny and incredibly fun gameplay the narrative is very interesting with psychological insights and tackles real world problems with the human psyche but in such a creative and entertaining way literal 1010
